ISSUE.TITLE: /static/netbox-light.css not found but used in netbox/templates/500.html
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.5 ### Python Version 3.12 ### Steps to Reproduce Found this when I get 500 Server error and look at HTTP responses in a browser dev window. ### Expected Behavior `netbox-light.css` should be in the source or used with correct name in `500.html` ### Observed Behavior 404 not found
